entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Hybrid Android Throws Exception Not Supported Picture-In-Picture(PIP) #28544
  • Application won't run #28543
  • [.NET 9 regression] CollectionView Scroll Bar broken sizing #28542
  • CollectionView2 Header Overlaps Items on iOS When Resized #28541
  • EventArgs.Cancel does not prevent navigation when canceling on OnNavigating event. #28539
    Backlog
  • MAUI and Razor components abstracted as a separate class library fail to build in .NET 10 Previews whereas .NET 9 works fine #28537
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Navigation breaks `VisualState` styles for `Picker`. #28536
    Backlog
  • VisualState does not obey style hierarchy rules #28535
    Backlog
  • Just looking at this and I think that this is all Java code so we probably should just do it in Java and let the bonding do the magic. #28532
    .NET 9 SR6
  • [Catalyst] CanMixGroups Set to False Still Allows Reordering Between Groups in CollectionView #28530
    Backlog

Closed

  • Make `IsVisibleCore` and `RefreshIsVisibleProperty` visible in .NET 10 #27739
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Documentation issue] Page.DisplayAlert wrong documentation (Task vs Task<bool>) #28517
    Backlog
  • CollectionView inside a Grid, various problems #12584
    Backlog
  • [iOS][Android] BlazorWebView not releasing resources after page closes in .NET 8 #28475
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix: Modal Animation Repeats When Returning from Background #28538
    platform/android 🤖, area-core-lifecycle, community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • Fix HideSoftInputOnTapped Not Working Net9 #28534
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests Issue18896 and disable Issue14471 test which fails in CI randomly #28533
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [NET10] Replace the obsolete RunJavaScriptTextInputPanel #28531
    area-blazor, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fixed the issue with SearchBar focus and unfocus events. #28529
    community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Scrollview.ScrollTo execution only returns after manual scroll #28528
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [.Net10] Make IsVisibleCore and RefreshIsVisibleProperty visible #28139
    t/breaking 💥, area-architecture, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [NET10.0] Fix parameter name for `ScrollViewerExtensions.UpdateScrollBarVisibility` #28255
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [NET10.0] Annotate `ListStringTypeConverter` for nullability #28244
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Documentation] Page.DisplayAlert wrong documentation (Task vs Task<bool>) - fix #28521
    area-docs, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [inflight/current] [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests Issue18896 and disable Issue14471 test which fails in CI randomly #28540
  • ViewExtensions Async suffix consistency #28506
    t/breaking 💥, area-animation, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] Fix ImageButton Padding the third #25223
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6

Updated

  • Update CommunityToolkit.Maui & Mvvm reference in template #28510
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix SafeArea management on iOS #28283
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed ScrollView Orientation Neither issue #27231
    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24906
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Remove PlatformWrapperView.java setHasShadow #28245
    t/breaking 💥, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [.NET 10] More public APIs related with Entry and Editor, pending TODOs #28467
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-controls-entry, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Update default value for LineHeight in the ToNSAttributedString method #28027
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fix the FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync() Not Returning Null When Canceled #27961
    t/breaking 💥, area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [2025/03/18] In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Windows] Fixed the text and icon color issues in the DatePicker when hovering over it. #27147
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • Improve VisualState order and prevent sticky Focused visual state #27477
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed the Label not sized correctly on Android #28215
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Move Android UITests to run on Linux #28513
    area-testing
  • [Android] Fixed GraphicsView drawable is visible outside the canvas #28353
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [NET10] Enable Nullability on ShellPageRendererTracker #28441
    area-controls-shell
  • [Android] CarouselView: Remove rounding from SizedItemContentView that results in off-by-one pixel error #25411
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 8 #28496
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Upgrade to Windows App SDK 1.7 #28499
    platform/windows 🪟, area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [ci] Update arcade net10.0 #28518
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Windows] Fix for FontImageSource color is not applied to the Tab Icon on the TabbedPage #26888
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 1 #26696
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Windows] Fixed the EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate issues in CollectionView #28472
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix Disabling some image tests after updating net9.0 with main #25770
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed the Header and Footer-Name textbox is cut off in collection view #26947
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Improve iOS CollectionView performance by leveraging the new platform level invalidation mechanism #28225
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    area-core-hosting
  • [Android] Top bar item colors - fix #26964
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [Windows] Implemented the AutomationPeers to the Border control #27713
    platform/windows 🪟, do-not-merge, community ✨, area-controls-border, t/a11y, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed VisualState Setters not working properly for CollectionView [Windows] #27230
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] - Reenable UITest VerifyInitialEntryReturnTypeChange with Adjustments for Navigation Bar Height Discrepancies on Android #27876
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Binding for ListView.IsRefreshing #28516
    community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Windows] Fix for FlyoutItem in overflow menu not fully interactable #27575
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Modal Animation Repeats When Returning from Background - Fix #28522
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-modal
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 3 #28103
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
